  • Method Details

    • goToNextLevel

      public void goToNextLevel()
      Change the level to the next (if applicable) To move onto the next level, some variables need to be carried over which is why the old player is stored so it is easier to store and pass on the information. All of the housekeeping such as turning off music and ensuring the health bar is updated with the change is done here.

    • setLevel

      public void setLevel​(GameLevel newLevel)
      Sets the level for the level that is loaded
      Parameters:
      newLevel - GameLevel

    • pause

      public void pause()

    • play

      public void play()

    • restart

      public void restart()
      restart the level with the required stats. When a level is restarted, the variables that were stored previously are then passed onto the the renewed level however this is only for the last two levels.

      public void mute()
